breaking_changes: Minimum Python version increased from 3.8 to 3.10
Minimum Node.js version increased from 14 to 16
Minimum memory requirement increased from 2GB to 4GB
migration_guide: Existing workflows using backend/frontend only can continue with v2.0.0. No migration needed unless you plan to use new ML or graphics features.
upgrade_recommendations: For ML features: Consider GPU availability
For graphics features: Update browser to support WebGL2
